caseTitle: Aina Haya v. Principal Peshawar Model Girls High School-I, Peshawar & others
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: In educational matters it is best to leave the disciplinary, administrative and policy matters of educational institutions to the professional expertise of the people running them, unless ofcourse there is a blatant violation of any of the fundamental rights or the law.
